EmailTemplate.description: Links to PR Setup and use Videos
EmailTemplate.name: PR setup and training
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! and Welcome to QuickBooks Payroll
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Here is that link to the videos that you and I had discussed.
http://payroll.intuit.com/support/training/product.jsp
These videos will walk you through everything you need to know to about processing your companies payroll in the QuickBooks Software.
Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any additional questions.
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | Enterprise Account Manager Work Phone: {!User.Phone} ext {!User.Extension} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
